p: Out of a sample of 2691 educators, 26.0% (95% CI: 23.6–28.6) reported one NCD, 7.1% (95% CI: 5.6–9.0) reported two and 2.2% (95% CI: 1.6–2.9) reported more than three NCDs. Table 2 shows that the presence of NCDs was significantly higher among females (40.0%), educators aged 45–54 years (41.1%), those teaching in school located in urban informal areas (48.2%), and those absent 20 days and more (48.8%), respectively.
